head.citation-title: 2017 4th International Conference on Signal Processing, Communication and Networking, ICSCN 2017
head.abstracts: The proceedings contain 107 papers. The topics discussed include: a new denoising algorithm for random valued impulse noise in images using measures of dispersion; research of avalanche effect of the 3GPP integrity algorithm F9; a sub-band based CAC scheme using adaptive codec switching for improved capacity and GoS of cognitive VoIP users; reverse analysis of measurement and control protocol based on the monitoring state data for unmanned platform; unimodality of MBType frame different metrics for efficient key frame extraction in video; super resolution enhancement of medical image using quaternion wavelet transform with SVD; detecting DDoS attacks using decision tree algorithm; decentralized secure framework for social collaborative Internet of Things; enhancement of reconfigurable FET using gate workfunction, inter-gate length and inter-gate dielectric permittivity; design and analysis of single precision floating point multiplication using Karatsuba algorithm and parallel prefix adders; efficient cache distribution management using hash routing and nodal clustering for information centric network; underwater image enhancement based on linear image interpolation and limited image enhancer techniques; design of pentagon shaped microstrip patch antenna with metamaterial for multiband application; automatic segmentation and recognition of iris images: with special reference to twins; and spectral efficiency analysis of subcarrier and link incorporation for optimizing the resource allocation in 4G LTE cellular systems.

translated-sourcetitle.$: 2017 4th International Conference on Signal Processing, Communication and Networking, ICSCN 2017
